function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inconsistent implementation of lockdown directives and measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in implementing sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of community transmission and outbreak in nearby communities due to park-related in polycentric park management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on the role of green areas in disease propagation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated park management","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of demand for new services and perspectives on park management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Organizational change shifting focus from aesthetics to ecological management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of urban green spaces managed by municipalities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunded spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service
